person.persName: John W. Clay (Nicholas County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Arnold Clay in Nicholas County on December 18, 1829. Father of Mary Clay, Maria Clay, Joseph Clay, Matthew Clay, William Clay, George M. Clay, James T. Clay, Sarah Catherine "Sallie" Clay, and Sidney Clay. Resident of Nicholas County, Kentucky, in 1830. Owned one enslaved person in Nicholas County in 1830. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1840. Owned one enslaved person in Nicholas County in 1840. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Montgomery County in 1860.
